content: वर्वर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [वृ-अरच् वुट् च] {@--1@} Stammering. {@--2@} Curled. --रः {@--1@} A barbarian. {@--2@} A blockhead, babbling fool. {@--3@} An outcast. {@--4@} Curly hair. {@--5@} The clash of weapons. {@--6@} A mode of dancing. --रा, --री {@--1@} A kind of fly. {@--2@} A kind of basil. --रं {@--1@} Yellow sandal-wood. {@--2@} Vermilion. {@--3@} Gum-myrrh.
